pages.text: "The Ghost haunting in the Tower."$(br2)"Unwilling to leave his Blade."$(br2)"He rigidly holds the Blade."$(br2)"The Ghost haunting in the Tower."$(br2)"For his Blade, Unwilling to rest."$(br2)"He rigidly holds the Blade."
Find Lich in the Twilight Forest, then slay it.
"The Ghost rested, but the Blade was left here."$(br2)"The new Owner of the Blade, please pray for its peace."
